* This website is hosted in an AWS S3 bucket.

* The static site was generated by [Hugo](http://gohugo.io) and the basic theme used was ["hello-friend-ng"](https://github.com/rhazdon/hugo-theme-hello-friend-ng) by [Djordje Atlialp](https://github.com/rhazdon).

* For specific modifications made to the theme, please [reach out](mailto:surnyeeyek@gmail.com).
